name: The Sun Represented as an Emperor on Horseback
description: The Sun Represented as an Emperor on Horseback; Unknown; Augsburg, Germany; shortly after 1464; Watercolor and ink on paper bound between original wood boards covered with original pigskin; Leaf: 30.6 x 22.1 cm (12 1/16 x 8 11/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig XII 8, fol. 47; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Sun Represented as an Emperor on Horseback
medium: Watercolor and ink on paper bound between original wood boards covered with original pigskin
